turtleDescriptionFullLine: TurtleCoin is a fun, fast, and easy way to send money to friends and businesses.
turtleDescriptionLineOne: TurtleCoin is a fun, fast, and easy way to send money
buildPlatforms: We have builds for Windows, Apple, and Ubuntu Linux.
funFacts: TurtleCoin has a 30 second block time, which means transactions confirm faster.
TurtleCoin has a private blockchain, nobody sees your money except you.
You can restore a deleted TurtleCoin wallet with your view key and spend key.

fastTransactions.title: Fast Transactions
fastTransactions.description: TurtleCoin is creating blocks every 30 seconds, as opposed to every 10 minutes. Your money travels 20x faster on TurtleCoin than on Bitcoin or BitcoinCash.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: TurtleCoin has the same privacy features you'll find in Monero and Aeon. Every transaction is private unless you choose to make it public.

easyToUse.title: Easy To Use
easyToUse.description: We support almost every OS, even on mobile you can make a secured paper-wallet for free, and get started with TurtleCoin in under 5 minutes.
easyToUse.linkSection: make a secured paper-wallet for free

easyToMine.title: Easy To Mine
easyToMine.description: TurtleCoin comes with its own basic CPU miner, but you can also use any Monero mining software you're used to if you'd rather use GPU's or mining pools. We recommend XMR-Stak Unified Miner.

community.title: Community
community.description: The TurtleCoin community is very welcoming to all users and developers. You won't get shouted at when things break, and we welcome critiques of our work. Please join us in our Discord Chat.

support.title: Support
support.description: We are growing a community of developers and testers in our GitHub meta-forum. You can help by testing software and submitting bug reports, or even just cheering us on from the sidelines.

projectQuickFacts: Here are some quick details about the project.
